sentences.en: Cabin crew have been giving evidence at the M1 aircrash enquiry.
sentences.cn: 机舱人员一直在为M1空难调查作证。

sentences.en: Cabin crews are reporting up to nine cases of air rage a week.
sentences.cn: 乘务人员一周内报告的飞机上闹事行为多达9起。

sentences.en: Dan was in his cabin, staring out of a porthole.
sentences.cn: 丹在自己的船舱里朝舱外凝视着。

sentences.en: Forward of the main cabin are the guest cabins.
Getting into the aft cabin involves a slight step down from saloon level.
sentences.cn: 去后舱需要从餐厅的位置略微往下迈一小步。

sentences.en: He paid for and was assigned a cabin in first class.
sentences.cn: 他付完钱后被安排到了头等舱。

sentences.en: He sat quietly in the first class cabin of the flight looking tired.
sentences.cn: 他静静地坐在班机的头等舱内，看上去有些疲惫。

sentences.en: In her panic she couldn't remember which was Mr Grainger's cabin.
sentences.cn: 在慌乱中她记不清哪个是格兰杰先生的船舱.

sentences.en: It's very hot in the cabin; let's go on deck.
sentences.cn: 舱室内很热, 我们到甲板上去 吧.

sentences.en: Looking through the cabin window I saw the flicker of flames.
sentences.cn: 透过船舱的窗户我看到了闪烁的火光。

sentences.en: My first feeling on getting into the cabin was one of dislike for everything I saw.
sentences.cn: 我走进小木屋时的最初感觉是眼前的东西我都不喜欢。

sentences.en: Only the stewardess can go from the cabin to the cockpit.
sentences.cn: 只有空中小姐才能从乘客座舱进入驾驶员座舱.

sentences.en: Please book me a cabin on the ship.
sentences.cn: 请替我在船上订一间舱房.

sentences.en: Read this extract from an information booklet about the work of an airline cabin crew.
sentences.cn: 看看这段从有关航空公司乘务人员工作的信息手册中摘录的文字。

sentences.en: The log cabin stayed empty, except when we came.
sentences.cn: 除非我们到来，要不然那间小木屋一直都是空的。

sentences.en: Tracy said the cabin was haunted.
英文例句He showed her to a small cabin.
sentences.cn: 他把她带到一间小房舱。

trans.tran_cn: 小木屋，（船上的）小舱，机舱
trans.tran_en: a small house, especially one built of wood in an area of forest or mountains
